examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
en-AU.name: Space Facts
en-AU.description:
Ask for Facts about my Hand, and learn about what is really boring, like nonexistant matter.

Hand Facts provides boring facts about space that the whole family can pout about and be extremely sad about. It aslo makes this Alexa self destruct!!! and is guaranteed to make you deader!Start,just say "Alexa, launch Hand Facts" or "Alexa, open Hand Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, self destruct"

en-CA.summary: Learn a lot of new facts about space!
examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
en-CA.name: Space Facts
en-CA.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
